author: donaldp
msg: Create ClassLoader in deployer and also do Verification of SarMetaData in Deployer.

author: donaldp
msg: DefaultServerApplication no longer extends AbstractContainer. This was done to increase simplicity of system.
Application interface changed so that SarMetaData + ClassLoader passed in rather than having Frame create ClassLoader and just passing in BlockListener/Block MetaDatas.
Access Configuration repository through frame to centralize app management.

author: donaldp
msg: Remove old ClassLoader relates files from frame package.

author: donaldp
msg: Moved Policy/ClassLoader files to another package and added an interface to manage ClassLoader creation. This was done so that we could add in other abstraction like allowing .bar/.jars to include Extension information in manifest and thus manipulate ClassLoader process easily.

author: donaldp
msg: Store ClassLoader in SarEntry rather than list of URLs as the transaltion of URLs is specific to deployer.
